text: Polygon is an American video game website that publishes news, culture, reviews, and videos. Polygon wanted to focus on the stories of the people making the games instead of the games themselves. They also produced long-form magazine-style feature articles, invested in video content, and chose to let their review scores be updated as the game changed. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Video game websites Category:Blogs Category:2012 establishments in the United States
title: Polygon (website)
